member.name: F:CryptoSoft.Encoder._key
member.summary: Secure encryption key used for file encryption and decryption.

member.name: M:CryptoSoft.Encoder.GenerateKey
member.summary: Generates a secure encryption key composed of random characters.
member.returns: A SecureString containing a randomly generated key.

member.name: M:CryptoSoft.Encoder.GetKeyBytes
member.summary: Converts the SecureString encryption key into a byte array.
member.returns: A byte array representing the encryption key.

member.name: M:CryptoSoft.Encoder.Encrypt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts a file using a XOR-based encryption algorithm.
member.param: The path to the source file to be encrypted.
The path where the encrypted file will be saved.

member.name: M:CryptoSoft.Encoder.Decrypt(System.String,System.String)
member.param: The path to the encrypted source file.
The path where the decrypted file will be saved.
